title: No Match History after 3 times ARAM mode
body: Today which is 24/07/2015 I update then I played 3 times ARAM mode wanted to earn the Bilgwater ions but I chick the Match History is nothing about that 3 times ARAM mode. And the first step to earn the Bilgwater ion is killed 200 ARAM minions and I already killed 200 minions in that 3 times ARAM mode and it's still 0 minions. Is that a bug? And I want to earn the Bilgwater reward !!!!!

replies.body:
I'm having the same problem here, please help :/

0/200 minions, and I have done 3 games where one was with 54 minions and another 33 and then the last with 156 as Kayle. But "ACT II on the ropes" are not receiving anything!!!

Hey Aug Lion,

NOC posted an update about the issue a few hours ago:
>Network Operations â€“ 4:58 AM
We are aware of issues with match history, end of games stats and Bilgewater rewards progress not working properly. We're currently investigating.

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#oce
I'm having the same issue. Apparently it is an issue on Riots end, and they are currently looking into finding a fix.
